title: Telemarketer

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players you call will be informed that a Telemarketer has a deal for them. They may accept the deal to receive a basic autovest. Receive 2 profit for each accepted deal
- Players who accept your deal will have 1 of their night feedbacks replaced with  “The constant ringing of your phone made it hard to hear something” each night
Item: Rotary Phone
- Cost 2
- Uses 2
- Dial: Replace a target’s night feedback with “The constant ringing of your phone made it hard to hear”

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all good players (to appease shareholders)

desc:
Post 5060
_”You fool, you’ve picked up a single call and now we’re gonna keep calling you until you block us!”_
